channel.title: Change A weapon From Melee To Range
channel.description: Alright This is going to sound complicated but i added the sniper rifle custom item i was wondering if there is a possible way to make the item shoot projectiles? and change it to a range based weapon if there is any possible way please get back to me

item.title: Change A weapon From Melee To Range
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

[quote]i added the sniper rifle custom item

Well ur item is set to meele by default, try including tne ID in all the Methods?

Read full topic
item.source: Change A weapon From Melee To Range
